data.actual_result: The color doesn't show up with people's name and instead makes people's name white
data.expected_result: The color from the role should appear with their name
data.short_description: When you're looking at someones name in chat, their corresponding role color doesn't appear with their name (this happens very rarely)
data.steps_to_repro: - Find someone in a random server in chat that has a role with a color attached to it (this doesn't apply to roles with the default color) - Obverse their name
